data.title: Latest news, views, pictures, video
data.meta_description: Born in New York in 1942, Scorsese's Italian heritage and the city he grew up in have influenced - and provided inspiration for - a fair few of his films. Amongst his most famous films are Taxi Driver, Raging Bull, Goodfellas, The Aviator and The Wolf of Wall Street. Martin Charles Scorsese has won many awards, but it was Boston cop thriller The Departed that bagged him his Oscar for Best Director in 2007.
data.text: Born in New York in 1942, Scorsese's Italian heritage and the city he grew up in have influenced - and provided inspiration for - a fair few of his films. Amongst his most famous films are Taxi Driver, Raging Bull, Goodfellas, The Aviator and The Wolf of Wall Street. Martin Charles Scorsese has won many awards, but it was Boston cop thriller The Departed that bagged him his Oscar for Best Director in 2007.
